Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: SMP Green Rides Africa Partner Dashboard

A complete driver acquisition management system for Greenwheels electric bike leasing in Uganda.

Features implemented:
- Authentication with Supabase \(login/register\)
- Dashboard layout with responsive sidebar navigation
- Pipeline board \(Kanban-style\) with drag-and-drop
- Driver management \(CRUD, search, filter, pagination\)
- Driver detail page with real-time data from Supabase
- Document upload/verification workflows with Supabase Storage
- Screening questionnaire system with auto-scoring \(9 questions, 65% pass threshold\)
- Analytics dashboard with Recharts \(funnel chart, pie chart, monthly targets\)
- Role-based access control \(smp_admin, smp_agent, partner\)
- CSV export for drivers and summary reports
- Real-time subscriptions via Supabase

Tech stack:
- Next.js 16 with App Router
- React 19 + TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Supabase \(PostgreSQL, Auth, Storage, Realtime\)
- Recharts for data visualization
- Vercel for deployment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
